subject: Self Care
title: Understanding Triggers
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Understanding Triggers.

hook.text: Every time you open Instagram, you were bored first. Boredom is the trigger. The app is just the response.

buildup.text: Bad habits are solutions to emotional needs: stress, boredom, loneliness, or the desire for comfort.

discovery.text: Identifying the trigger is the first step. Without knowing why you act, you can't change the behavior.

twist.text: Most people attack the behavior directly and ignore the trigger. That's why willpower alone always fails.

climax.text: Next time the urge hits, pause and ask: what am I actually feeling? The trigger reveals the real problem.

punchline.text: Find the trigger. That's where the habit lives.

quiz.question: Why is identifying the trigger essential to breaking a bad habit?
options: It makes the habit more enjoyable
Without knowing the cause you can't change the behavior
